name: The Laundry
description:
One fine evening, your main character was about to go to the laundry room and wash his clothes, after he woke up there, someone locked him with a key ....

When you wake up, you will find yourself locked in an unknown closed dark room. Why are you here? Find the “notes” and escape from the room. But you should pay attention that the psycho from the laundry always watches and looks after you, your task is not to fall into his hands.

Features
  • Atmospheric sounds
  • Note system
  • Unexpected moments
